response.original_title: Civil War Minutes 3: Gettysburg and Stories of Valor
response.overview: Gettysburg and Stories of Valor, a 3-hour, 2-disc DVD set, captures the scenic beauty of the Gettysburg battlefield, and presents a unique documentary collection of 30 Gettysburg and Civil War stories, narrated by Keith Carradine, and told with an artful blending of live footage from the battlefield, still pictures, drawings, engravings, and never before seen photographs.
response.title: Civil War Minutes 3: Gettysburg and Stories of Valor
